long_description: This Coleman Dual-Fuel 2-Mantle lantern runs on either unleaded gasoline or white gas, making refills more convenient. Adjustable light output for activities ranging from reading to eating to relaxing by the fire. Burns for nearly 8 hrs. full-on and up to 14 hrs. at a low setting per tank of fuel. Easy to use-just pump, light with a match and adjust the control knob. Rugged features include heat-resistant glass globe, coated steel fuel tank and porcelainized steel ventilator. Fuel tank cap screws on for no-leak protection. Wire handle can be used to carry the lantern or hang it at camp. Dual-Fuel 2-Mantle lantern works with #21 Coleman mantles. Funnel is included to prevent fuel spillage during refills.
short_description: This Coleman Dual-Fuel 2-Mantle lantern runs on either unleaded gasoline or white gas, making refills more convenient.
